title: IMT shouldn't be out of NALCS
body:
Hey Riot,
I simply don't see a reasoning of IMT not being in the NA LCS despite that they came from a 7th place team in Spring Split to 2nd in the Summer Split including to Riot earning tons of money by buying IMT icons etc.. Remember that is just my opinion and I know that I don't know things behind the scenes, but if you could somehow manage to get IMT in NA LCS I will and many other fans will be so happy!

replies.body: ESPN updated their article has to do with financial issues with IMT at least thats Riots stance
